title: jeopardy screen typeface???
content:
Does anyone know the typeface that was used to pose the question on TV’s Jeopardy?  
Please see attached.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205155753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jeopardy20071011_5978.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jeopardy20071011.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205155753/http:/typophile.com/files/jeopardy20071011.png) | 194.4 KB |

 [‹ Lord of War Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205155753/http:/typophile.com/node/44822 "Go to previous forum topic") [Jack Planck FONT ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205155753/http:/typophile.com/node/44815 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j25_jones

comments.content: Don’t you mean “What is ITC Koinna”?
I made a [silly joke](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205155753/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14442) about this a few years ago, but I don’t think anybody got it.
